name: mwt_portal_cronjobs
description: Configures MWT web portal remote recipes via cron
maintainer: Roadhouse Interactive and Infinite Game Publishing

recipes.mwt_portal_cronjobs::default: Configures recipes to be remotely executed on an app array.  These jobs are scheduled via cron.
recipes.mwt_portal_cronjobs::remote_playspan_com: Remotely execute the Playspan complete pending requests recipe.
recipes.mwt_portal_cronjobs::remote_user_grant_w: Remotely execute the user grant watchdog recipe.
recipes.mwt_portal_cronjobs::remote_user_log_cle: Remotely execute the user log cleanup recipe.
